solution_line_template: The entire budget of Centerville is ${library_spent} / {library_percent} = $<<{library_spent}/{library_percent}={total_budget}>>{total_budget}
The budget for the parks is ${total_budget} * {parks_percent} =$<<{total_budget}*{parks_percent}={parks_spent}>>{parks_spent}
After the park and the library there will be ${total_budget} - (${library_spent} + ${parks_spent}) = $<<{total_budget}-({library_spent}+{parks_spent})={amount_left}>>{amount_left} left in the budget.
